title: Small grammar error in greater vision totem
body:
The description reads "Places an visible..." when it should read "Places a visible..."

The correct grammar is displayed on the description of individual pink wards.

replies.body:
Hey RunningInSquares,

Thanks for the report! This should be fixed next patch! ^-^
I thought the n was silent...

~~The visible part is intentional but OP is referring how the tooltip should read "_**a**_ visible" instead of "_**an**_ visible".~~
Edit: Strikethrough
